hero.text: Join Sukon and start your journey in providing psychological support!

step1.title: Required Criteria for Each Specialization:
step1.description: Information you need to know before registering

psychologist.title: Clinical Psychologist
psychologist.req1: Master’s degree in psychology or clinical psychology
psychologist.req2: Two years of experience in clinical psychology

counselor.title: Psychological Counselor
counselor.req1: Master’s degree in psychology or counseling psychology
counselor.req2: Five years of experience in psychological counseling

step2.title: 1- Account Creation Form
step2.description: Please enter all required information to complete the registration process

step3.title: 2- Academic Qualifications
step3.description: Please enter all required information to complete the registration process

step4.title: 3- Professional Information
step4.description: Please enter all required information to complete the registration process
step4.license_org_placeholder: Example: Saudi Commission for Health Specialties

work_on_clinic.label: Do you work in a clinic?

step5.title: 4- Upload Documents
step5.description: Please enter all required information to complete the registration process

cv.label: Attach Resume
cv.placeholder: Click to select a file or drag it here

certificates.label: Attach Certified Certificates (Educational, Experience)
certificates.placeholder: Click to select a file or drag it here

num_of_qualifications.label: Do you have more than one qualification?

step6.title: 5- Review & Submit
step6.description: Please review all required information to complete the registration process

errors.firstNameMinLengthError: The first name must be at least 3 characters long
errors.secondNameMinLengthError: The second name must be at least 3 characters long
errors.titleMinLengthError: The title must be at least 3 characters long
errors.emailInvalidError: Sorry, this is not a valid email

errors.highestDegreeInvalidError: Sorry, this is not a valid degree
errors.graduationYearInvalidError: Sorry, this is not a valid year
